item.title: Radiohead - Creep - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Creep performed by Radiohead. Chords used in the song: B, C, Cm, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Just The Way You Are performed by Billy Joel. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, B7, Bm7, D, Dm, Dmaj7, E, Em, Esus4, F, F♯m, F♯m6, G.
